original_text: Joseph was still in his house when Judah and his brothers arrived. They threw themselves on the ground in front of Joseph.
korean_text: 유다와 그의 형제들이 요셉의 집에 이르니 요셉이 아직 그 곳에 있는지라 그의 앞에서 땅에 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: Joseph was still in his house
when Judah and his brothers arrived
They threw themselves on the ground
